title: Author Correction: Neutralizing GDF-15 can overcome anti-PD-1 and anti-PD-L1 resistance in solid tumours
author: Ignacio Melero
excerpt: Nature - Author Correction: Neutralizing GDF-15 can overcome anti-PD-1 and anti-PD-L1 resistance in solid tumours
text: Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-024-08305-z Published online 11 December 2024In the version of the article initially published, the affiliation of Ralf Bargou was incorrect and has now been amended to “Comprehensive Cancer Center Mainfranken, University Hospital Würzburg, Würzburg, Germany” in the HTML and PDF versions of the article. Nature (2025). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-025-08827-0Download citationPublished: 25 February 2025DOI: https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-025-08827-0
html:
Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-024-08305-z Published online 11 December 2024

In the version of the article initially published, the affiliation of Ralf Bargou was incorrect and has now been amended to “Comprehensive Cancer Center Mainfranken, University Hospital Würzburg, Würzburg, Germany” in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
